checks.label: Duplicate payment verification
checks.detail: 4 high-confidence groups (£4.4K). Duplicate ratio: 0.5%. Filtered out: 2 batch payments, 305 CSV overlaps.

checks.label: Split payment analysis
checks.detail: No suspicious split payment patterns detected with tightened thresholds (5+ payments, 80%+ of limit).

checks.label: CH compliance verification
checks.detail: No confirmed payments during active breach periods after filtering enrichment errors and undated violations.

checks.label: Cross-council price comparison
checks.detail: 2 shared suppliers found. 0 with >200% price gap (requiring 3+ transactions each side). Extreme disparities (>10,000%) filtered as different service scopes.

checks.label: Benford's Law forensic screening
checks.detail: Significant deviation from Benford's Law (p < 0.001). χ²=93.74 on 352 amounts >£100. Largest deviation: digit 1 (10.2% off expected).

warnings: Benford's Law analysis shows significant deviation (χ²=93.74). Digit 1 deviates 10.2% from expected. This warrants investigation but can also occur with legitimate round-number grants or threshold-based payments.
